org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.impl

Class ReactorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.BladeBase
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.impl.ReactorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Runnable, Blade, Closeable, RequestSource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ThreadBoundReactorImpl, UnboundReactorImpl

    public abstract class ReactorImpl
extends BladeBase
implements Closeable, java.lang.Runnable, RequestSource
    Base class for internal reactor implementations.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.BladeBase

        BladeBase.AsyncBladeRequest<RESPONSE_TYPE>, BladeBase.SyncBladeRequest<RESPONSE_TYPE>
